Plot: Billy Halleck, good husband and loving father, is both beneficiary and victim of the American good life: He has an expensive home, a nice family, and a rewarding career as a lawyer...but he is also fifty pounds overweight and edging into heart attack country.
Characters: Billy Halleck, Heidi Halleck, Linda Halleck, Taduz Lemke, Gina Lemke, Richie Ginelli
